title: Google\Cloud\Gaming\V1\GkeClusterReference
name: GkeClusterReference
description:
A reference to a GKE cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gaming.v1.GkeClusterReference

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cluster
params.description: The full or partial name of a GKE cluster, using one of the following forms: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/clusters/{cluster} locations/{location}/clusters/{cluster} * {cluster} If project and location are not specified, the project and location of the GameServerCluster resource are used to generate the full name of the GKE cluster.

methods.name: getCluster
methods.description:
The full or partial name of a GKE cluster, using one of the following forms:

  • projects/{project}/locations/{location}/clusters/{cluster}
  • locations/{location}/clusters/{cluster}
  • {cluster} If project and location are not specified, the project and location of the GameServerCluster resource are used to generate the full name of the GKE cluster.

Generated from protobuf field string cluster = 1;
